reuters.title: NYSE REPORTS PRELIMINARY DOW CLOSING AT 1738.41, OFF 508.32, LARGEST IN HISTORY
reuters.body: Shr profit 1.07 dlrs vs loss 1.19 dlrs Net profit 3,326,000 vs loss 3,446,000 Nine mths Net profit 9,714,000 vs profit 3,665,000 NOTE: Latest and prior nine month per share amounts not given. Reuter 
